ygData.subject: Re: NUNCHUCKS! COOL!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: actually, I ve heard its more like 36.  and we STILL out damage warriors. now, take the fact that someone suggested that nunchucks should have a delay of 16,
ygData.messageBody:
actually, I've heard its more like 36. and we STILL out damage warriors.

now, take the fact that someone suggested that nunchucks should have a
delay of 16, and we would be doing twice as much damage. plus, they would
hit harder, so now lets say 3 times the damage, plus magic effects.

I think that would make us a bit unbalanced. at most, I think nunchucks
would hit a bit harder, but offer MORE delay than fists. there has to be
a trade off.

On Sat, 28 Aug 1999, Steven Pietrzyk wrote:

> From: Steven Pietrzyk <faleaus@...>
>
> I know h2h delay of 30 doesnt make sence...... but thats the way Verant
> programmed it so thats how we have to live with it.
>
> Kplatte wrote:
>
> > From: "Kplatte" <asmo@...>
> >
> > Ok that doesn't make sense! Your fist has a 30 delay then how can some
> > weapons have a delay below 30?
> > Would think fist should be the fastest delay!! Hmmm doesn't seem right that
> > holding a weapon makes you attack faster....
